fulltext:
AndrewNguyen
NGUYEN HUYNH VIET DUNG
CONTACT
YoB: 1989
Email: vietdung.nh@gmail.com
Address: 107/3/10, Street 1, Ward 11, Go Vap District, HCM City
PROFILE
Looking for a position in QC which have professional and challenging working environment which
related to my knowledge as well as achieved skill from the fied.
SUMMARY
4 years of experience in software quality assurance
O.5 year of experience in Web automation
Extensive work experience on software testing techniques
Expertise in Test documentation such as Test Plan, Test Data..
+_Well yersed in.Defect Iracking & Bug-Reportingusing Defect Tracking tool
Have general knowledge of methodology followed in the SDLC and STLC
Having good knowledge inautomation with Selenium as wellas Katalon tol, building framework with Selenium
Having basic knowledge in ERP system
Manual skills
Extensive work experience on Sanity Testing, Regression Testing,
Functional testing, and System Testing, User Interface Testing and Ad-
hoc testing
Having basic knowledge with APl testing
E
Expertise in documentation including preparation of Test Plan, Test
Specification and Test Procedure, Test Data
Wellversed in Defect Tracking & Bug Reporting using Defect Tracking
tool
Have general knowledge of methodology folowed in the SDLC and
STLC
Automation skills
Having basic knowledge with programming language: Java
Buildingframework with elenium
Having good knowledge in automated testing tool: Selenium,
Cucumber
Having good knowledge in automation testing framework: TestNG
Having good knowledge in automation tool with Selenium as we as
Katalon Studio
Having experience with using IDEs: Eclipse, Intell IDEA
Having good knowledge in web technologies: HTML, CSS, Jquery
SKILLS
Requirements Analysis
Software testing
SQL Server basic
Web Automation with Katalon, Selenium
Building framework with Selenium
Have good knowledge with build tools: Maven
HTML, CSS, Wordpress
Programming language: Java
SOFT SKILLS
Ability to acquire new knowledge
Willig to study new technologies
Hard-working
Dynamic, and both team and in-dependency
EXPERIENCE
KMS Technology, Inc. - QA Engineer
October 2017 - Present
Project: ERT
Participating in all reviews of the project at offshore
Creating testig artifacts: test cases, test reports, testscripts, test summary, test outputs..
Reviewing documents testing and estimating testing effort
Managing and performing develop test scripts
Managing and performing the testing execution
Coordinating and communicating with others (including PGH Coordinators and offshore members) in carrying out testing and maintaining test
schedule
Using Katalon Studio tool to implement some parts of the project
Synova Solutions - QA Engineer
April 2017 - October 2017
Project: VCCI HCM | EDEEL
Executed Test, developed Test cases
Prepared Environment testing
Gathering requirement with the internal team to clarify the requirement
Supported team leader to trained new team member
Communicated and solved the problem with clients
Solved problem in QA team
CommGate - QC cum support coordinate Project
Jan 2015 - Mar 2017
Work with internal teams to obtain an in-depth understanding of the product and the documentation requirements
Analyze existing and potential content, focusing on reuse and single-sourcing opportunities
Gathering requirement on internal ERP project about Sales, Accounting, Purchasing, Warehouse..
Develop and Execute Test Cases for testing Website, Landing page, Appointment Booking
Supported team leader to trained new team member
Writing technical document
Communicated between VN team and SG team to clarify and gather requirement
Manage and make sure project go live on-time
EDUCATION
ISTQB Course - 2016
TVN - TESTING VN Limited Company
Bachelor in Business Administration - 2015
FPT - University of Greenwich
